full_summary:
### Wellbeing Digital Platform Request for Information
#### Sollicitation Overview
The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking proposals from the industry to develop a Wellbeing Digital Platform as part of its Wellbeing strategy. The platform will provide enhanced wellbeing support to employees and touch on three wellbeing dimensions: Mind, Life, and Body.

#### Tender Overview
**Procurement ID**: PW-23-01028723
**Tender Reference**: OSFI-2023-Wellbeing App
**Deadline**: **March 17, 2023, at 14:00:00** (Eastern Time)

#### Solicitation Background
The purpose of this Request for Information (RFI) is to gather industry feedback and input on a proposed digital wellbeing platform. OSFI aims to obtain information on the capabilities and approaches of industry stakeholders in developing and implementing digital wellbeing platforms.

#### Response Information
Responses received during this RFI process may be used by OSFI to inform the development of a Request for Proposal or a Request for Tender. This information will help OSFI determine what features and functionalities should be included in the procurement to meet its stakeholder requirements and align with industry best practices.

#### Contact Information
For contract-related inquiries or submissions, please contact:

* Chris Zaremba
* Email: [Contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:Contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)
#### Additional Resources

To access the RFI package and supporting documents in English, please visit <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/14/3ec932115d0542d5ba9175e7c9112811/rfi_-_wellbeing_application_-_q_and_a_english.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/03/40b95e412f313dab94dd934d99b394e0/rfi_-_wellbeing_application_-_english.pdf>

For access to the RFI package and supporting documents in French, please visit <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/14/541dd59756c6da0f402aa8f3d9ddee13/rfi_-_wellbeing_application_-_q_and_a_french.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/03/9a6958fc03f79
